name: Spaghetti With Zucchini And Mint
keywords: main course, parmigiano-reggiano, spaghetti, zucchini, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 3 or 4 small zucchini, about a pound, washed, trimmed and cut into slices 1/8 to 1/4 inch thick
Freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pound spaghetti, linguine or other long pasta
1/2 cup roughly chopped mint, parsley or basil

recipeInstructions.text: Salt a large pot of water, and bring it to a boil over high heat. Put the olive oil into a 10- or 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat. A minute later, add the zucchini, and cook, stirring only occasionally, until very tender and lightly browned, 10 to 15 minutes. Season with a little salt and a lot of pepper.

Beat the eggs and 1/2 cup of the cheese together. Add the pasta to the boiling water, and cook until it is tender but firm. When it is done, drain it, and combine it immediately with the egg-and-cheese mixture, tossing until the egg is cooked. Add the zucchini, and toss again. Taste, and add more salt and pepper if necessary.
Toss in the herb, and serve immediately, passing the remaining cheese at the table.
